markdownRemark.excerpt: Did you know that in every product you buy, you‚Äôre paying more for taxes / services the by the product itself? Every month you pay a fee from your salary, to‚Ä¶
markdownRemark.html:
Did you know that in every product you buy, you‚Äôre paying more for taxes / services the by the product itself? Every month you pay a fee from your salary, to pay taxes, and every month you pay car taxes, house. Nowadays you pay taxes even to go to your friend‚Äôs house, and don‚Äôt even know that, and still, Brazil is able to create new ways to steal our money. With the common internet shopping, many people decide to risk themselves and buy exterior products, with the risk of being taxed. This is how it works: If you buy a product, regardless of what it costs, of a company, you‚Äôll be taxed, that‚Äôs the law of this country. So, the few people that thought that they would buy some things, for reasonable prices, were wrong.

Many products go without being taxed, because it‚Äôs a large amount of mail that get everyday on Brazil.

But, there is a small truce to the ones who have friends outside Brazil, if a person sends a product to another person and less than 50.00 dollars, it cannot be taxed. That‚Äôs good, right? We can still be happy, if you have friends outside.

Recently was the release day of Pok√©mon Platinum, for DS . I‚Äôm addicted to Pok√©mon, and I ran after its pre release and my Giratine‚Äôs Action Figure :D! The pre-order was made on Amazon.com, but unfortunately they don‚Äôt send Nintendo products to Brazil, I don‚Äôt know why, so I asked a friends of mine who lives in Los Angeles to buy and send it to me, so I‚Äôve got it by Priority Mail International and the declared value of it was 35,00 dollars. I was already happy, close to get the cartridge before everyone in Brazil, so I‚Äôve realized that the product has gone to verify it there were any taxes or not!

That‚Äôs when I got furious, and with reason, because it‚Äôs almost making one month that my friend sent it, and it was by Priority Mail International, delivering in 7 days, I paid expensive to be quick, and it‚Äôs stuck in there! The product comes with the fiscal note, and with my own, and my friends name on the envelope. That‚Äôs ok, I won‚Äôt be taxed, but still, the product took more than 4 times to get here, even going legally.

End of the history: Not only we pay taxes even for breathing, when we have the pleasure to get a present from a friend, they do that just to screw us, for fun!

Brazil \o/

pageContext.alternativeHtml:
Did you know that in every product you buy, you‚Äôre paying more for taxes / services the by the product itself? Every month you pay a fee from your salary, to pay taxes, and every month you pay car taxes, house. Nowadays you pay taxes even to go to your friend‚Äôs house, and don‚Äôt even know that, and still, Brazil is able to create new ways to steal our money. With the common internet shopping, many people decide to risk themselves and buy exterior products, with the risk of being taxed. This is how it works: If you buy a product, regardless of what it costs, of a company, you‚Äôll be taxed, that‚Äôs the law of this country. So, the few people that thought that they would buy some things, for reasonable prices, were wrong.

Many products go without being taxed, because it‚Äôs a large amount of mail that get everyday on Brazil.

But, there is a small truce to the ones who have friends outside Brazil, if a person sends a product to another person and less than 50.00 dollars, it cannot be taxed. That‚Äôs good, right? We can still be happy, if you have friends outside.

Recently was the release day of Pok√©mon Platinum, for DS . I‚Äôm addicted to Pok√©mon, and I ran after its pre release and my Giratine‚Äôs Action Figure :D! The pre-order was made on Amazon.com, but unfortunately they don‚Äôt send Nintendo products to Brazil, I don‚Äôt know why, so I asked a friends of mine who lives in Los Angeles to buy and send it to me, so I‚Äôve got it by Priority Mail International and the declared value of it was 35,00 dollars. I was already happy, close to get the cartridge before everyone in Brazil, so I‚Äôve realized that the product has gone to verify it there were any taxes or not!

That‚Äôs when I got furious, and with reason, because it‚Äôs almost making one month that my friend sent it, and it was by Priority Mail International, delivering in 7 days, I paid expensive to be quick, and it‚Äôs stuck in there! The product comes with the fiscal note, and with my own, and my friends name on the envelope. That‚Äôs ok, I won‚Äôt be taxed, but still, the product took more than 4 times to get here, even going legally.

End of the history: Not only we pay taxes even for breathing, when we have the pleasure to get a present from a friend, they do that just to screw us, for fun!

Brazil \o/
pageContext.title: Brazilian taxes

previous.excerpt: Sabia que todo produto que voc√™ compra, voc√™ est√° pagando‚Ä¶
previous.html:
Sabia que todo produto que voc√™ compra, voc√™ est√° pagando mais por impostos/servi√ßos do que o pr√≥prio produto em si? Todo m√™s √© descontado um valor do seu sal√°rio, para pagar taxas, todo m√™s voc√™ paga impostos de carro, casa. Hoje em dia voc√™ paga impostos ao ir na casa do seu amigo, e nem est√° sabendo disso, e mesmo assim, o Brasil ainda consegue criar novos meios para roubar nosso dinheiro. Com a populariza√ß√£o de compras pela internet, muitas pessoas resolveram come√ßar a ser arriscar a comprar produtos do exterior, com um risco de serem cobrados impostos em cima deles. O funcionamento √© o seguinte: Se voc√™ comprar um produto, independente do valor, de uma empresa, voc√™ dever√° ser taxado, essa √© a lei do nosso pais. Ou seja, as poucas pessoas que acharam que iam conseguir comprar produtos por pre√ßos razo√°veis, j√° foram abordadas pela lei.

Muitos produtos passam sem serem taxados, pois √© uma quantia enorme de encomendas que chegam de fora todos os dias no Brasil.

Porem, existe uma pequena tr√©gua para quem tem conhecidos fora do Brasil, se uma encomenda for enviada com o valor menor que 50,00 d√≥lares, de pessoa f√≠sica para pessoa f√≠sica, essa encomenda n√£o poder√° ser taxada. Que bom ent√£o, n√©? Ainda podemos ser felizes se tivermos amigos l√° fora.

Recentemente foi o lan√ßamento de Pok√©mon Platinum, para DS . Eu sou viciado em Pok√©mon, sempre fui, e corri atr√°s da compra no pr√©-release da fitinha, e ganhar a minha Action Figure do Giratina :D! A pr√©-encomenda foi feita no Amazon.com, s√≥ que infelizmente eles n√£o enviam produtos da Nintendo pro Brasil, n√£o sei porque, ent√£o eu enviei para um amigo meu que reside nos Los Angeles e pedi para ele me enviar, ele me enviou por Priority Mail International e o valor declarado foi o valor do produto (35,00 dolares). Eu j√° estava feliz, prestes a receber a fitinha junto com todo mundo que estava esperando o lan√ßamento no Brasil, e ent√£o eu percebi que o produto tinha ido para verifica√ß√£o para ver se ia ser taxado ou n√£o!

Foi a√≠ que eu fiquei revoltado, e com todo o motivo, j√° vai fazer um m√™s que o meu amigo me enviou, sendo que foi por Priority Mail International, entrega em 7 dias, eu paguei caro para ele me enviar por esse m√©todo, para ficar preso na alfandega! O produto acompanha nota fiscal com declara√ß√£o do valor, o valor declarado no envelope e o nome do meu amigo como remetente e o meu como destinat√°rio. Tudo bem, eu n√£o vou ser taxado (caso seja, vou recorrer), mas mesmo assim, o meu produto demorou quatro vezes mais para chegar, mesmo eu indo no caminho da sociedade, dentro da lei.

Moral da hist√≥ria: Al√©m da gente pagar impostos at√© para respirar, quando temos um alivio de receber um presente de um amigo, eles fazem quest√£o de nos sacanear, s√≥ por divers√£o!

Brasil \o/
previous.rawMarkdownBody:
![taxas](../../uploads/blog/2009/04/taxas.png "taxas")

Sabia que todo produto que voc√™ compra, voc√™ est√° pagando mais por impostos/servi√ßos do que o pr√≥prio produto em si? Todo m√™s √© descontado um valor do seu sal√°rio, para pagar taxas, todo m√™s voc√™ paga impostos de carro, casa. Hoje em dia voc√™ paga impostos ao ir na casa do seu amigo, e nem est√° sabendo disso, e mesmo assim, o Brasil ainda consegue criar novos meios para roubar nosso dinheiro. Com a populariza√ß√£o de compras pela internet, muitas pessoas resolveram come√ßar a ser arriscar a comprar produtos do exterior, com um risco de serem cobrados impostos em cima deles. O funcionamento √© o seguinte: Se voc√™ comprar um produto, independente do valor, de uma empresa, voc√™ dever√° ser taxado, essa √© a lei do nosso pais. Ou seja, as poucas pessoas que acharam que iam conseguir comprar produtos por pre√ßos razo√°veis, j√° foram abordadas pela lei.  

Muitos produtos passam sem serem taxados, pois √© uma quantia enorme de encomendas que chegam de fora todos os dias no Brasil.  

Porem, existe uma pequena tr√©gua para quem tem conhecidos fora do Brasil, se uma encomenda for enviada com o valor menor que 50,00 d√≥lares, de pessoa f√≠sica para pessoa f√≠sica, essa encomenda n√£o poder√° ser taxada. Que bom ent√£o, n√©? Ainda podemos ser felizes se tivermos amigos l√° fora.  

Recentemente foi o lan√ßamento de [Pok√©mon Platinum](http://pokemonplatinum.com/ "Site oficial"), para [DS](http://nintendods.com/ "Site oficial") . Eu sou viciado em Pok√©mon, sempre fui, e corri atr√°s da compra no pr√©-release da fitinha, e ganhar a minha [Action Figure do Giratina](http://kidconfidence.com/blogs/2009/02/11/pokemon-platinum-giratina-figure/ "Giratina Action Figure") :D! A pr√©-encomenda foi feita no [Amazon.com](http://amazon.com/ "Site oficial"), s√≥ que infelizmente eles n√£o enviam produtos da [Nintendo](http://nintendo.com/ "Site oficial") pro Brasil, n√£o sei porque, ent√£o eu enviei para um amigo meu que reside nos Los Angeles e pedi para ele me enviar, ele me enviou por [Priority Mail International](http://www.usps.com/international/prioritymailinternational.htm "USPS.com") e o valor declarado foi o valor do produto (35,00 dolares). Eu j√° estava feliz, prestes a receber a fitinha junto com todo mundo que estava esperando o lan√ßamento no Brasil, e ent√£o eu percebi que o produto tinha ido para verifica√ß√£o para ver se ia ser taxado ou n√£o!

Foi a√≠ que eu fiquei revoltado, e com todo o motivo, j√° vai fazer um m√™s que o meu amigo me enviou, sendo que foi por [Priority Mail International](http://www.usps.com/international/prioritymailinternational.htm "USPS.com"), entrega em 7 dias, eu paguei caro para ele me enviar por esse m√©todo, para ficar preso na [alfandega](http://www.abe.mre.gov.br/mundo/america-do-norte/estados-unidos-da-america/washington/servicos/tratamento-alfandegario "Site oficial")! O produto acompanha nota fiscal com declara√ß√£o do valor, o valor declarado no envelope e o nome do meu amigo como remetente e o meu como destinat√°rio. Tudo bem, eu n√£o vou ser taxado (caso seja, vou recorrer), mas mesmo assim, o meu produto demorou quatro vezes mais para chegar, mesmo eu indo no caminho da sociedade, dentro da lei.

Moral da hist√≥ria: Al√©m da gente pagar impostos at√© para respirar, quando temos um alivio de receber um presente de um amigo, eles fazem quest√£o de nos sacanear, s√≥ por divers√£o!

Brasil \o/

next.rawMarkdownBody:
Hoje eu achei um v√≠deo muito antigo de umas manobras de [fingerboard](http://fingerboard.com/ "Site oficial") que eu gravei, na √©poca que eu era mais v√≠ciado.  

At√© hoje eu carrego o meu skatinho no bolso, na √©poca desse v√≠deo eu cheguei at√© a ter apoio de marca gringa de skatinho. Eu acho um "esporte" muito irado, pra quando eu n√£o posso andar de skate, tenho sempre o meu v√≠cio vers√£o "portatil" ;D

Segue o v√≠deo

`youtube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QtruOZhVxVQ`

messages.title: Title
messages.author: @thepiratepablo
messages.e3_paragraph_1: This page once featured a countdown to the next E3 event, a moment that countless gamers and industry professionals looked forward to each year. E3 was not just an event; it was a celebration of our shared passion for video games, a place where dreams were realized, and memories were made.
messages.e3_paragraph_2: From the electrifying announcements to the hands-on demos, E3 was the heartbeat of the gaming world. It brought together people from all corners of the globe, united by their love for games. For many, it was a chance to meet their heroes, discover new titles, and experience the thrill of the latest innovations in gaming technology.
messages.e3_paragraph_3: However, as the gaming landscape has evolved, so too has the way we connect and celebrate our passion. While E3 has come to an end, the spirit of excitement and community it fostered lives on. We now look forward to new ways of coming together, sharing our love for games, and creating new memories.
messages.e3_paragraph_4: Though the countdown is gone, the legacy of E3 will forever remain in our hearts, reminding us of the incredible journeys we've taken and the bonds we've formed along the way.

messages.forty_two_page.title: Forty Two
messages.forty_two_page.description: So long and thanks for all the fish!
messages.projects_page.title: Projects
messages.projects_page.description: Here is a list of some of my favorites personal projects.
messages.projects_page.gatsbyMaterialUiBlogDescri: A simple Gatsby Blog Starter with Material UI.
messages.projects_page.contractBuilderDescription: Contract Builder is a free open-source project that allows anyone to easily maintain and build any kind of contract (legal documents, lawsuit, rent, agreements, construction and so on) using Google Spreadsheets. This was develop as a personal project to help a friend who was struggling spending up to an hour to make a custom contract, now she is able to do it in less than 5 minutes. Hooray!
messages.projects_page.resumeBuilderDescription: Resume Builder is a free open-source project that allows anyone to easily maintain and build any kind of resume using Google Spreadsheets. This was develop as a personal project to help a friend who was struggling spending up to an hour to make a custom resumes.
messages.projects_page.magentoChatbotDescription: With this module you can fully integrate your Magento store with the most popular chat apps in the market. This means that by simply installing this module and a few clicks you can have a new way to show and sell your products to your clients. Very easy to use! Try now, it's FREE.
messages.projects_page.jamStackSortenerDescriptio: This is a basic URL shortener POC build with Gatsby.
messages.projects_page.gotinhaDescription: It was always my dream to make my own game, and after trying Unity a couple years ago, I decided to try it again with something I'm more familiar with: Javascript. As a frontend developer, Javascript is already the language that I write most of my code at work and also in my personal projects, and after a quick search I was able to find the amazing PhaserJS Framework for building 2D web games.

messages.cookie_law.we_use_cookies: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. By using our website you agree to our
messages.cookie_law.title: Cookie policy
messages.cookie_law.what_are_cookies_text: As is common practice with almost all professional websites this site uses cookies, which are tiny files that are downloaded to your computer, to improve your experience. This page describes what information they gather, how we use it and why we sometimes need to store these cookies. We will also share how you can prevent these cookies from being stored however this may downgrade or 'break' certain elements of the sites functionality. For more general information on cookies, please read
messages.cookie_law.how_we_use_cookies_text: We use cookies for a variety of reasons detailed below. Unfortunately in most cases there are no industry standard options for disabling cookies without completely disabling the functionality and features they add to this site. It is recommended that you leave on all cookies if you are not sure whether you need them or not in case they are used to provide a service that you use.
messages.cookie_law.disabling_cookies_text: You can prevent the setting of cookies by adjusting the settings on your browser (see your browser Help for how to do this). Be aware that disabling cookies will affect the functionality of this and many other websites that you visit. Disabling cookies will usually result in also disabling certain functionality and features of the this site. Therefore it is recommended that you do not disable cookies.
messages.cookie_law.site_preferences_cookie_text: In order to provide you with a great experience on this site we provide the functionality to set your preferences for how this site runs when you use it. In order to remember your preferences we need to set cookies so that this information can be called whenever you interact with a page is affected by your preferences.
messages.cookie_law.third_party_cookies_text: In some special cases we also use cookies provided by trusted third parties. The following section details which third party cookies you might encounter through this site.
messages.cookie_law.third_party_cookies_item_1: This site uses Google Analytics which is one of the most widespread and trusted analytics solution on the web for helping us to understand how you use the site and ways that we can improve your experience. These cookies may track things such as how long you spend on the site and the pages that you visit so we can continue to produce engaging content. For more information on Google Analytics cookies, see the official Google Analytics page.
messages.cookie_law.third_party_cookies_item_2: From time to time we test new features and make subtle changes to the way that the site is delivered. When we are still testing new features these cookies may be used to ensure that you receive a consistent experience whilst on the site whilst ensuring we understand which optimisations our users appreciate the most.
messages.cookie_law.more_information_text: Hopefully that has clarified things for you and as was previously mentioned if there is something that you aren't sure whether you need or not it's usually safer to leave cookies enabled in case it does interact with one of the features you use on our site. However if you are still looking for more information then you can contact us through our
